item.description:
This is our second monthly video screening in Manchester. We'll have screenings every Tuesday somewhere in the Merrimack Valley: 1st Tuesday-Nashua; 2nd Tuesday-Manchester; 3rd Tuesday-Concord; 4th Tuesday-Plymouth. If there's a 5th Tuesday in a month, maybe we'll have a Truth Party somewhere!

-------------------------
When we first started the Merrimack Valley 911 Truth group, our first act was to host Michael Berger (in Concord) to a showing of his new film, Improbable Collapse. We've decided to show it again after almost 2 years to our Manchester viewing crowd. His video talks about the 3 different government reports about the collapses of the WTC towers and touches on the WTC 7 tower. His video contains some footage of the WTC7 rubble that has not been seen anywhere else, since it was shot clandestinely by someone who was in that secured area with a video camera rolled up in a newspaper under his arm.

A great and engaging video. If we have time, we'll show a couple of shorts, as well.

-------------------------
We'll also go over how each attender can become more involved and spread the workload of running a meetup like this.

We'll have free DVD's and DVD's and books for sale. Everyone should bring their collection for trading, viewing, copying, etc. Bring your favorite books, too. We've developed a collection of books for sale at these various meetings. We hope that each of you will be able to donate $5 to help us build our collection of supplies, but please come anyway if you cannot afford that.

------------------------------------------------
Please arrive at 6:30 if you can, in order to get your dinner and beverages from Tom's fine buffet, sushi bar and stir fry bar. We'll start a brief business meeting at 7 and then on to the video showings.

Parking is plentiful in the lot out in front of the Great Buffet.

------------------------------------------------
Merrimack Valley 911 Truth has set up a "carpooling group" online at eRideShare.com. Carpooling arrangements can now be made by clicking on the link above to go to the online ridesharing group. Our group nickname is "mv911t" and our password is "truth". You can post if you are driving to one of our events and have extra seats - if you're looking for a ride to an event just logon and post that you're seeking a ride.

As always, donations for the ride-sharing are appreciated to cover gas costs.
item.how_to_find_us: You'll see me fiddling with the TV and DVD player
item.name: Manchester - Improbable Collapse; The Demolition of Our Republic
